title: update -r  quits upon first unsuccessful update instead of just reporting error and going on
body:
```shell
(git)smaug:/mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl/openneuro[master]git
$> datalad update --follow sibling --merge=ff-only -r
...
[INFO   ] Fetching updates for <Dataset path=/mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl/openneuro/ds001529> 
merge(ok): ds001529 (dataset) [Merged origin/master]                                                                                                                                                                               
update(ok): ds001529 (dataset)
[INFO   ] Fetching updates for <Dataset path=/mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl/openneuro/ds001531> 
Fetch:   0%|                                                                                                                                                                                     | 0.00/2.00 [00:00<?, ? Remotes/s]
Username for 'https://github.com': 
Password for 'https://github.com': 
CommandError: 'git fetch --verbose --progress --prune --recurse-submodules=no origin' failed with exitcode 128 under /mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl/openneuro/ds001531                                                          
remote: Repository not found.
fatal: Authentication failed for 'https://github.com/OpenNeuroDatasets/ds001531.git/'
datalad update --follow sibling --merge=ff-only -r  51.34s user 24.75s system 42% cpu 2:58.73 total
```
That ds001531 -- it was removed (I need to either remove it as well or remove remote and somehow annotate for `update` to not bother updating it)
